item.title: How to Update Cell Value in Pandas
item.description: This is how you update a value at a specific cell: Suppose the row index of the cell is row_idx, and the column label is 'colname', then you can update the cell value this way: df.at[row_idx, 'colname'] = new_value. Or: Suppose the row index of the cell is row_idx, and the column index is col_idx, then you can update the cell value this way: df.iat[row_idx, col_idx] = new_value.
